question: Which country hosts the annual "Bread and Butter tradeshow" event?
explanation: Germany hosts the annual "Bread and Butter tradeshow" event. Bread&Butter was an annual Berlin-based event and a year-round online shopping hub by Zalando. This show provides access to pre-launches and rare items, with a particular focus on streetwear and sneakers, is part of Bread&Butterâ€™s DNA. Brands such as Vans, Adidas, Eastpak, Nike, and many more, created unique products specifically for release at Bread&Butter.
